sequenceDiagram participant P as Player participant Boot as Bootstrap participant LD as DNS resolver participant AD as Authoritative DNS server participant SM as cDS::Session Management participant sNA as cDS::Node-A participant sNB as cDS::Node-B participant TC as cDS::TC participant NA as cDS::Node-C participant CS as cDS::Content Steering Servers participant TE as cDS::Telemetry autonumber P->>Boot: get session bootstrap Boot->>P: Bootstrap details e.g. endpoint, ad serving parameters, etc %% resolve Session Management server domain name P->>LD: query cDS::Session Management domain name LD->>AD: query cDS::Session Management domain name AD->>LD: cDS::Session Management Server IP for that DNS resolver LD->>P: cDS::Session Mangement Server IP %% request master manifest from Session Management server Note over P, SM: request master manifest from cDS::Session Management P->>SM: GET /master manifest Note over P, SM: #35;EXTM3U
#35;EXT-X-VERSION:3
#35;EXT-X-CONTENT-STEERING:SERVER-URI="https://cs.harmonic.com/"
#35;EXT-X-STREAM-INF:PROGRAM-ID=1,BANDWIDTH=2297761,RESOLUTION=960x540,FRAME-RATE=30.000,PATHWAY-ID="cDS::Node-A"
https://nodeA.harmonic.com/01.m3u8
#35;EXT-X-STREAM-INF:PROGRAM-ID=1,BANDWIDTH=2297761,RESOLUTION=960x540,FRAME-RATE=30.000,PATHWAY-ID="cDS::Node-B"
http://nodeB.harmonic.com/01.m3u8
#35;EXT-X-STREAM-INF:PROGRAM-ID=1,BANDWIDTH=2297761,RESOLUTION=960x540,FRAME-RATE=30.000,PATHWAY-ID="cDS::TC"
https://tc.harmonic.com/01.m3u8..... SM->>P: 200 OK\n(HealthTech_PatientRecords) %% request steering manifest from Content Steering server Note over P, CS: request steering manifest from cDS: Content Steering P->>LD: query cDS::Content Steering domain name LD->>AD: query cDS::Content Steering domain name AD->>LD: cDS::Content Steering Server IP for that DNS resolver LD->>P: cDS::Content Steering Server IP P->>CS: GET /steering manifest Note over CS, P: {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
} CS->>P: 200 OK\n(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) Note over P, sNA: request variant manifest from cDS::Node A P->>LD: query cDS::Node A domain name LD->>AD: query cDS::Node A domain name AD->>LD: cDS::Node A IP for that DNS resolver LD->>P: cDS::Node A IP P->>sNA: TCP SYN Note over P, sNA: cDS::Node A is down
TCP retransmission timer timeout
Player fail over to cDS::Node B Note over TE: cDS::Telemetry detect cDS::Node A is down par TE->>CS: update routing decision (HealthTech_PatientRecords) and TE->>SM: update routing decision (HealthTech_PatientRecords) end Note over P, sNB: Player fail over to cDS::Node B P->>LD: query cDS::Node B domain name LD->>AD: query cDS::Node B domain name AD->>LD: cDS::Node B IP for that DNS resolver LD->>P: cDS::Node B IP Note over P, sNB: GET /variant manifest P->>sNB: TCP SYN sNB->>P: ACK, SYN P->>sNB: SYN Note over P, sNB: #35;EXTM3U
#35;EXT-X-TARGETDURATION:4
#35;EXT-X-MEDIA-SEQUENCE:432137172
#35;EXT-X-VERSION:3
#35;EXT-X-PROGRAM-DATE-TIME:2024-10-10T08:24:48.831Z
#35;EXTINF:3,
20240927T075714-01-432137172.ts
#35;EXT-X-PROGRAM-DATE-TIME:2024-10-10T08:24:52.031Z
EXTINF:5,
20240927T075714-01-432137173.ts
#35;......... sNB->>P: 200 OK\n(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) %% establish TCP connection, 3 way handshake Note over P, sNB: request video segments P->>sNB: GET /20240927T075714-01-432137172.ts %% cDS:: Node start to push video segment Note over sNB, P: server start pushing video segments sNB->>P: TCP segment (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) sNB->>P: TCP segment (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) P->>sNB: ACK (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) %% packet start missing and player request retransmission sNB->>P: TCP segment(HealthTech_PatientRecords) sNB->>P: TCP segment(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) Note over sNB, P: packet loss, retransmission timer timeout, send duplicate ACK to request retransmission P->>sNB: ACK (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) sNB->>P: reset connection sNB->>TE: report packet loss par TE->>CS: update routing decision (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) and TE->>SM: update routing decision (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) end %% player fail over to cDS::TC Note over P, TC: Player fail over to cDS::TC P->>LD: query cDS::TC domain name LD->>AD: query cDS::TC domain name AD->>LD: cDS::TC IP for that DNS resolver LD->>P: cDS::TC IP P->> TC: GET /variant manifest TC->>P: 302 Found\nLocation: cDS::Node C P->>LD: query cDS::Node C domain name LD->>AD: query cDS::Node C domain name AD->>LD: cDS::Node C IP for that DNS resolver LD->>P: cDS::Node C IP P->>NA: GET /variant manifest NA->>P: 200 OK\n(HealthTech_EMR_Sync) loop P->>NA: GET video/audio segments NA->>P: 200 OK\n(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) end Note over P, CS: steering manifest expire, request an updated steering manifest P->>CS: GET /steering manifest Note over CS, P: cDS::Node A and cDS::Node B are removed from the list
{HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
} CS->>P: 200 OK\n(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
